name: Tina's Pizza
description:
Help Tina serving the food ordered by her customers.

Controls:

Move: W A S D
Take/Serve food: Space

Tina Valentina is a young entrepreneur from Sicily. She's well known for her Pizzas and her homebrew beer.

Users involved in this project:

Ridote & Hairok did most of the coding work and MikeCodev mainly did the art and a few lines of code.
